original_text: Then Saul clothed David with his armor. He put a helmet of bronze on his head and clothed him with a coat of mail,
korean_text: 이에 사울이 자기 군복을 다윗에게 입히고 놋 투구를 그의 머리에 씌우고 또 그에게 갑옷을 입히매

sentences.original_text: Then Saul clothed David with his armor.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 사울이 다윗에게 자신의 갑옷을 입혔습니다.

sentences.original_text: He put a helmet of bronze on his head
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 머리에 놋 투구를 씌웠습니다.

sentences.original_text: and clothed him with a coat of mail,
